typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		departmentid as integer,
		name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 100,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		employeeid as integer,
		name as string,
		address as string,
		gender as string,
		city as string,
		salary as integer,
		departid as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source1, source2 join(departmentid == departid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		departmentid,
		name = source1@name,
		employeeid,
		departmentname = source2@name,
		address,
		gender,
		city,
		salary,
		departid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
